Projects.Description: Our team performed Factor Analysis on Business Model elements published by various authors in the domain over the past two decades. The analysis was performed by scrutinising existing proposals and collecting associated data from Executives of firms in India. The analysis yielded three main factors which can be used for creating Business Models.

Projects.Project Title: Recosilk - A Case Study
Projects.Description: A case study on Reliance's yarn - Recosilk. The project involved research and collection of related data about the yarn. Details and aspects regarding the marketing tactics used for promoting the product were analysed.

Projects.Project Title: Telecom Survey: Service Quality Analysis
Projects.Description:
We conducted a survey on the top telecom brands in India to record customer preferences and experience with their respective Network Service Provider(s). The collected data was analyzed to interpret the users' perception of what these brands stand for and how satisfied they were with the services. The results were presented using tabulated metrics and graphs.
Survey Tool: Google Form
Analysis Tools: R and Excel

Projects.Project Title: Human activity recognition using web based image mining and computer vision API for smart homes
Projects.Description:
A novel method to couple Web mining and computer vision for automatically extracting ADL (Activity of Daily Living) models from visual items. Our method relies on Web image search engines to select the most relevant pictures for each considered activity. We use off-the-shelf computer vision APIs and a lexical database to extract the key objects appearing in those pictures. We introduce a probabilistic technique to measure the relevance among activities and objects. Through experiments with a‚Ä¶

Minutiae extraction based verification with higher standards of security and reliability; Effective during high global distortion of fingerprints.

Name: Akriti Gupta
Headline: Founder-Canfem | UN Awardee| WEF Awardee | TEDx | Cancer Care Provider
About:
Award-winning social entrepreneur passionate about revolutionizing cancer care through scalable, inclusive, and innovative solutions. As the Co-founder & CEO of Canfem and Founding Vice President of Win Over Cancer, I‚Äôve dedicated my career to creating measurable impact and revolutionizing cancer care.
At Win Over Cancer, I‚Äôve spearheaded national level programs, including awareness campaigns, leading to a 300% increase in early cancer detection practices, and co-developed low-cost breast prosthetics, benefiting over 20,000 women. At Canfem, I‚Äôve built India‚Äôs first Cancer Support Platform, addressing the non-clinical needs of cancer survivors. Our products and services, designed to be 80% more affordable than imports, have achieved a 93% satisfaction rate while supporting over 50,000 survivors.
With a proven track record of raising about $2M in funds, fostering 150+ partnerships with leading cancer institutes and NGOs, and driving significant year-over-year growth, I‚Äôve scaled ventures that combine profitability with purpose. My leadership style fosters collaboration, mentorship, and innovation within teams.
Recognized globally, my journey includes accolades like the Diana Award by the British Royal Family and the United Nations Volunteering Award. I‚Äôve represented India at prestigious platforms, delivered a TEDx talk, and shared insights at global conferences.
An Acumen Fellow and Miller Center alumna, I aim to continue creating systems-level change through advocacy, education, and scalable solutions that redefine survivorship for millions. Let's connect to collaborate, innovate, and make an impact together.

Projects.Project Title: Airplane Passenger Satisfaction Analysis
Projects.Description: Executed Data Pre-Processing and Exploratory Data Analysis on the Airline Passenger Satisfaction dataset with 25000+ passenger records and developed a Binary Classification Model employing Machine Learning Techniques to determine the classification model best suited for classifying passengers into satisfaction brackets; achieved Recall of 92% with KNN

Projects.Project Title: Banking Management System- SQL
Projects.Description: Developed Database Management System for a Bank using MySQL for efficient data retrieval to interact with customers, tracking their transactions, loan status and also the loan defaulters to drive profound insights and used Tableau for visual comprehension

Projects.Project Title: Aviation Accidents Trend Analysis-Tableau
Projects.Description: Performed Data Pre-Processing on the Aviation Dataset with 80000+ flight accidents records from 40 US States using Python; employed a variety of Tableau tools, such as parameters, sets, and calculated fields to develop an interactive dashboard and story; analyzed and investigated the circumstances that promoted the aircraft accidents and determined the types of injuries in each case; identified 2 of the Flight Phases(~48%) and Engine Type(~8%) to be among the major factors

Projects.Project Title: Hotel Review Analysis- NLP
Projects.Description: Completed Topic Based Modeling (LDA Model) and Sentiment Analysis (TextBlob) on Chennai Hotel reviews, identified most discussed 3 topics for service improvement and customer experience enhancement using Natural Language Processing

Projects.Project Title: Water Quality Analysis
Projects.Description: Performed Data Pre-Processing and Exploratory Data Analysis on the water pollution dataset with more than 5000 records to analyze the factors which facilitated the water pollution, through visualization and several Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn

Projects.Project Title: Financial Statement Analysis
Projects.Description: Performed Financial Statement Analysis (Ratio Analysis, Trend Analysis, and Common size Analysis) on 5 year financial Accounts including Balance Sheets and Income Statements of 5 leading companies in the Oil Gas & Consumable Fuels Sector: Indian Oil Corporation Ltd., Indraprastha, Reliance Industries Ltd, Adani Total Gas Limited, and Oil & Natural Gas Corporation Limited

Volunteer.Description:
I led the promotional campaign for Zenith'23, the departmental fest hosted by the Department of NWC at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai, on behalf of Women In Tech. Utilizing diverse outreach strategies both online and offline, I effectively disseminated information about the event to broaden its audience and impact.
Within the fest, our organization collaborated with multiple clubs to curate Pitchers, a competitive platform where participants showcased their pitching skills by presenting various products to a discerning panel of judges. Pitchers stood out as a highlight among the array of dynamic events offered during Zenith'23, enhancing the festival's overall appeal and fostering a memorable experience for all participants.
To kick off the festivities preceding the main event, I orchestrated the formation of a five-member band, delivering a captivating performance. This musical spectacle catalyzed generating anticipation and excitement surrounding the upcoming events. The performance garnered significant attention, contributing to the overall success and heightened publicity of the subsequent day's events.
Show less

I assumed a multifaceted role in hosting and coordinating a competition organized by our distinguished organization, Women In Tech SRM, in collaboration with the NWC department at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai. During this event, participating teams presented their projects to a discerning panel, vying for prizes and the opportunity to receive valuable guidance and mentorship from the esteemed judges.
My responsibilities encompassed comprehensive event promotion,  preparation of materials, adept emceeing, and proficient coordination of all logistical aspects.
Show less

Our organization, Women In Tech SRM, affiliated with the NWC  department at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai, orchestrated a webinar centred on the evolution of technology. This insightful event unfolded via the Zoom platform, facilitating interactive engagement between our esteemed speaker and the participants, who gained valuable insights into the topic.
In this capacity, I assumed the responsibility of strategizing the event's phases, orchestrating its publicity,  to ensure the seamless execution of the proceedings.
Show less

I spearheaded the planning and coordination of the inaugural non-technical event for our Club, Women in Tech SRM, under the auspices of the NWC department, hosted at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai. The event, an Open Mic, was organized with the primary aim of providing a platform for participants to exhibit their talents on stage.
Additionally, I actively participated in the event as a contestant, contributing to its success and fostering a vibrant atmosphere of engagement and empowerment.
Show less

Projects.Project Title: IMPROVING FRAUD DETECTION: LEVERAGING MACHINE LEARNING STRATEGIES [VIIIth SEMESTER]
Projects.Description:
In the contemporary financial landscape, access to credit is pivotal for individuals and businesses alike. However, mitigating the risks associated with lending remains a significant challenge, particularly for local money lenders with limited resources and infrastructure. To address this challenge, we present a prototype system for fraud detection in bank loan data, tailored specifically for verified local money lenders operating in collaboration with small banks.

Projects.Project Title: TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT SYSTEM USING VEHICLE COUNT ANALYSIS AND OBJECT DETECTION
Projects.Description:
Introducing technologies such as real-time data analysis, and connected vehicles to create a dynamic and adaptive traffic management system. By employing recorded video footage as its primary input source, and by utilizing the advanced Simple Online and Realtime Tracking (SORT) algorithms, the system embarks on a sophisticated journey of data analysis. Its primary objective is to discern, with a keen and discerning eye, the individual vehicles that bear the responsibility for causing traffic‚Ä¶
Show more

Projects.Project Title: OPERATOR PRECEDENCE GRAMMAR- COMPILER DESIGN
Projects.Description:
This project focuses on implementing an operator precedence parser for handling operator
precedence grammars efficiently. The parser is implemented using the operator precedence
parsing algorithm, which is based on the concept of operator precedence and associativity.
The system architecture includes a parser generator that generates the parse table and a parser
that reads the input expression and evaluates it using the parse table.

Projects.Project Title: AI Implementation in a Multinational Corporation
Projects.Description:
In this case study, we will explore the implementation of Artificial Intelligence
(AI) in a Multinational Corporation (MNC). The MNC in question operates in
the retail industry and has a global presence. It has recognized the potential of
AI to enhance its operations, improve customer experience, and drive business
growth. We will examine the various AI applications deployed by the company
and their impact on different areas of the business.

alarm clock.

Projects.Project Title: Speech Emotion Recognition
Projects.Description: It is a model made using bidirectional LSTM. It predicts the emotion of the speaker by taking a voice sample as input. The model achieved an accuracy of 86%. It classifies the voice sample into 8 emotions. The model is integrated with the website using Flask and the frontend for the website is made using HTML,  JS and CSS.

Projects.Project Title: Marketinintellect.in
Projects.Description: Marketing intellect is an organisation that provides data analytics, data visualisation and digital marketing services. This is a lead generation website for the company. It is made using Bootstrap, PHP and MySQL.

Projects.Project Title: Diabetic retinopathy detection using Deep Neural Networks
Projects.Description: It is a neural network model made using a Convolutional Neural Network. It classifies the severity of Diabetic retinopathy in a person into 4 levels. The model takes a fundus image and processes it to give out the results. This project aims to show the use of technology in the healthcare industry. The areas deprived of testing laboratories can use these technologies to predict the severity of a disease without the hassle of going to a bigger city. The model has an accuracy of 93%.

Projects.Project Title: Stock Manager
Projects.Description: It is a desktop application which helps in managing stock issued to the technician and the total quantity of each item left in the inventory. It uses python and SQLite.

Projects.Project Title: Attendance Manager
Projects.Description: It is a desktop application developed using Python and Mysql. It helps you to manage your attendance in college and plan your weekly schedule accordingly.

Projects.Project Title: Ambiora'19 Application
Projects.Description: Ambiora'19 App is an android application which gives a countdown timer for each and every event in Ambiora (Technical fest of NMIMS) also it gives updates of the change in venue.It uses Firebase for database and is currently live on google play.

Projects.Project Title: Flavium Application
Projects.Description:
Flavium Application  is an android application which displays the upcoming matches and the previous winners,it is an application built for college sports event,it uses "Firebase" for database.
It is live on google play store.

Projects.Project Title: Sentiment Analysis
Projects.Description:
The Internet offers a variety of places where people can post their views, comments, feedback, etc. This could be in form of tweets, Facebook posts & comments, posts & comments on various forum & tech-sites, posts on web-sites & virtual communities and more. It is becoming increasingly important to have a mechanism wherein the "sentiments" expressed in the above posts are checked not manually but by a machine.
We use Sentiment Analysis for automating such tasks. This WebApp provides two‚Ä¶
Show more

Projects.Project Title: Swfitkey Predictive Text Analysis
Projects.Description:
People are spending an increasing amount of time on their mobile devices. But typing on mobile devices can be a difficult task. Swiftkey builds a smart keyboard that makes it easier for people to type on their mobile devices. One cornerstone of their smart keyboard is predictive text models.
N-Gram Back-off method has been used to predict the next possible word or words when a word or a sequence of words is typed.

Projects.Project Title: Key India Economic Indices

The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has rich traditions of publishing data on various aspects of the Indian Economy through several of its publications. iMonit monitors your servers and alerts you in case any of them don't respond as expected. This early warning system can help you nip problems in the bud, before they escalate out of control.
iMonit allows you to:
- Monitor all your servers on a single, convenient mobile screen.
- Set up monitors for web servers, email servers, database servers and other custom services.
- Specify different monitoring intervals per monitor.
- Maintain and view a historical trend of server‚Ä¶

Projects.Project Title: BackTrack
Projects.Description:
BackTrack is a LAN based solution that provides a real-time and reliable system for backing up and storing computer files. It is easy to use and simple to install.
BackTrack User will run on ALL computers within your LAN and periodically send your valuable backup data to BackTrack Server. Your data is then securely stored and is only accessible by you, when you require it. BackTrack backup is intelligent. Only updated / modified files are backed. Data is transferred to BackTrack Server‚Ä¶

Name: Darshan Pandya, Ph.D.
Headline: Researcher | Academician | OSCM Consultant & Mentor
About:
I am an Assistant Professor, researcher, and supply chain strategist with a keen interest in understanding and addressing the complex challenges shaping global trade, logistics, and operations. My work combines academic research with industry insights, focusing on the intersection of AI, analytics, risk management, and policy shifts in modern supply chains.
My research interests comprise of Supply Chain Resilience & Risk Management, AI & Data Analytics in Supply Chains, Trade, Logistics & Policy Implications, Sustainable & Ethical Supply Chains
I actively engage in industry discussions, academic collaborations, and thought leadership in operations, supply chain strategy, and analytics. I welcome opportunities to exchange ideas, collaborate on research, and contribute to advancing the field of supply chain management.
In addition, I am the author of Supply Dechained, a newsletter dedicated to exploring emerging trends, disruptions, and technological advancements influencing global supply networks. Through data-driven analysis and strategic insights, I aim to bridge the gap between theory and practice in supply chain management.

Name: Deepak Choubey
Headline:
COO at Schbang Tech and SchbangQ |
ICICI | Harvard | ITC | CERN
About:
About Me: A Journey of Growth, Learning, and Giving Back: Welcome to my profile! I'm thrilled you're taking the time to get to know me. My story is a tapestry woven with threads of support from friends, mentors, family, nature, and my own determination. I'm grateful for every experience that has shaped me.
1) Educational background: My journey began in an Army Public School, where I learned the invaluable lessons of discipline and consistency. These qualities paved my way to IIT Madras, where I spent four transformative years. I learnt the balance of life, horizontal and verticle expertise, importance of health, friendships and family. It changed me to still carry an inertia of growth and constant learning.
2) Professional Experiences: Professionally, I'm at the helm of Schbang and SchbangQ as COO Tech, leading a dynamic team of 80 individuals. We're passionate about empowering businesses with delightful IT solutions, from mobile and desktop apps to SaaS products and websites. My role involves daily interactions with diverse stakeholders, from seasoned business leaders (for building the business) to fresh graduates (to hire the top talent-interviewed over 800+ candidates).
3) Internships roller coaster: While I was a part of the team building Virtual Instruments (yes you could play Guitar, Drums, flute and other instruments in air) in my 2nd year, then I landed up at CERN, Switzerland to work on CMS. Working 30 metres underground with particle colliders was an insane experience. Coats India & ITC exposed me to the Indian style of hardwork and execution. The people there shaped me for better. Forever grateful to them.
4) NGOs: Giving back to society and this universe is close to my heart. I've been actively involved with MAD chapters across Chennai, Hyderabad, and Mumbai for over three years, finding immense fulfillment in teaching underprivileged children. It's been incredibly rewarding to see some of these students secure full scholarships to study in Japan.
5) Hobbies: Ever-evolving. I've learnt dancing through YouTube tutorials and find joy in writing poetry. Spirituality has been a seven-year journey, recently enriched by studying the Bhagavad Gita with industry leaders to gain insights on leadership and life. Through it all, my enduring passion for reading remains constant, serving as a faithful companion in my personal growth.
Thank you for your time and interest. I'm always open to engaging discussions, so feel free to reach out. Let's connect and explore new ideas together!

Name: Harsh Patel
Headline: Developer | Freelancer @ Fiver | Pre-Final UG - SRM | srmKzilla | FOSS United Chennai | FOSS Club | NextTechLab
About:
I am a sophomore undergrad dedicated to the pursuit of a Computer Science and Engineering degree, backed by a formidable two-year freelance tenure as a Backend and Bot Developer.
My relentless enthusiasm for cutting-edge technologies and unwavering commitment to open source initiatives propel my journey in this field. Proficient in an array of technologies, TypeScript stands as a strong pillar in my array, while my future aspirations include improving my skills in GoLang.
In my role as a Freelance Bot Developer on Fiverr, I have had the privilege of working with over 15 clients, including distinguished names such as Katana Inu, Zavage, and Expertrons. Beyond bot development, I also provide discord auditing services to ensure optimal functionality.
Currently, my focal point resides in constructing robust backends utilizing NestJS, ExpressJs and TypeScript, with a determined pursuit of mastering Golang on the horizon. My dedication to the technology realm is unshakable, and I remain open to forging connections, fostering collaborations, and embarking on novel projects.
For further inquiries or collaboration opportunities, please do not hesitate to reach out to me at iam.harshnpatel@gmail.com.
